From the main menu, select the \'Add Inventory Item\' button. In the resulting screen, fill in all displayed fields. These fields include: Serial Number, Item Name, Category, Model, Condition, and Location. Please refer to the help topic on Item Conditions to select the correct condition of the equipment. Once complete, click the \'Add\' button to add the item.

From the main menu, choose either \'View Current Inventory\' or click the magnifying glass to perform a search for the desired item. Once it is found from either page, click the item to open the \'Edit/Remove Item\' page. All fields will be populated with the current information. Click the \'Edit\' button, and then tap on the desired field(s) and make changes as needed. Once complete press \'Save\' to save all changes. If a mistake was made, press \'Cancel\' to discard changes.

From the main menu, choose either \'View Current Inventory\' or click the magnifying glass to perform a search for the desired item. Once it is found from either page, click the item to open the \'Edit/Remove Item\' page. Click the \'Remove\' button, and select \'Yes\' from the following prompt to remove the item.

When choosing the condition of equipment please note the following: 

Excellent - New or like new (no appearance of wear) 

Good - Minimal wear 

Fair - Showing signs of wear and/or minor missing components 

Poor - Excessive wear, broken, and/or major missing components

From the main menu, select the \'Generate Report\' button. In the resulting screen, select the desired report from the dropdown menu. In the upper right hand corner, click the top right button that looks like a box with an arrow to export the file. From the resulting screen, a user may log into a Google account to print, save, email, or share the report.

From the main menu, select the \'Barcode Scanner\' button. In the resulting screen, select the scan button to open the scanning feature. A red flashing line will appear on the screen. Position the red line to cross perpendicularly over the barcode to be scanned. Once the device recognizes the barcode, the "Add Item" screen will appear with the serial number populated by the value of the barcode. From this point, refer to the help topic on Adding an Item to continue to complete the addition of the new item.
